Study.Citation:
Allison, C., Auyeung, B., & Baron-Cohen, S. (2012). Toward Brief
"Red Flags" for Autism Screening: The Short Autism Spectrum Quotient
and the Short Quantitative Checklist in 1,000 Cases and 3,000 Controls.
Journal of the American Acad of Child & Adolescent Psychiatry, 51(2), 202-212.
